exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, grip bar shoulder-width apart, lower to chest, press up

exercises.name: Incline Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to 30-45¬∞, press dumbbells or barbell from inclined position

exercises.name: Decline Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to decline, press weight from declined position

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.instructions: Lie flat, arms wide, bring dumbbells together in arc motion

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Hands shoulder-width apart, lower chest to ground, push up

exercises.name: Chest Dips
exercises.instructions: Lean forward on dip bars, lower body, press up focusing on chest

exercises.name: Cable Flies
exercises.instructions: Set cables at chest height, step forward, bring handles together in arc motion

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, pull body up until chin over bar

exercises.name: Barbell Rows
exercises.instructions: Bent over, pull barbell to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.instructions: One knee on bench, row dumbbell to hip, squeeze back

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.instructions: Sit at machine, pull bar to chest, control the weight

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.instructions: Feet hip-width, grip bar, lift by driving hips forward

exercises.name: T-Bar Rows
exercises.instructions: Straddle bar, pull to chest with neutral grip

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.instructions: Feet shoulder-width, descend until thighs parallel, drive up

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward, lower back knee, push back to start

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Sit in machine, press weight with legs, control descent

exercises.name: Leg Curls
exercises.instructions: Lie face down, curl heels toward glutes

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.instructions: Sit in machine, extend legs straight, control descent

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Rise up on toes, hold briefly, lower slowly

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlifts
exercises.instructions: Keep legs slightly bent, hinge at hips, feel hamstring stretch

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar or dumbbells overhead, keep core tight

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.instructions: Arms at sides, raise dumbbells to shoulder height

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells in front to shoulder height

exercises.name: Rear Delt Flyes
exercises.instructions: Bent over, raise arms wide, squeeze shoulder blades

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.instructions: Start palms facing you, rotate and press overhead

exercises.name: Upright Rows
exercises.instructions: Pull bar up along body to chest height

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.instructions: Arms at sides, curl weight up, control descent

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.instructions: Hands on bench/chair, lower body, press up with triceps

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.instructions: Neutral grip, curl dumbbells without rotating wrists

exercises.name: Tricep Extensions
exercises.instructions: Overhead, lower weight behind head, extend back up

exercises.name: Close Grip Press
exercises.instructions: Narrow grip bench press focusing on triceps

exercises.name: Preacher Curls
exercises.instructions: Arms on preacher bench, curl weight with strict form

exercises.name: Planks
exercises.instructions: Hold push-up position, keep body straight

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie down, hands behind head, crunch up engaging abs

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.instructions: Sit with feet up, rotate torso side to side

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.instructions: Lie down, raise straight legs up and lower slowly

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
exercises.instructions: Hang from pull-up bar, raise legs up to 90 degrees, lower with control

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest

exercises.name: Dead Bugs
exercises.instructions: On back, opposite arm/leg extensions while keeping core tight
